Articles.Content:
i need help the bda gui is stuck on the bottom left screen,PLEASE how do i get back UP plesae help me what do i do without deleting it. howwwwwwww ?????!!!!!!

 

https://imgur.com/a/Kh6Ny0J

I looked at the image.  I see no BDA gui in bottom left.  Are you sure you have it open?  All I see are KSP gui items.  Try clicking the BDA icon in the stack on the right hand side.  It says "BD Armory" on it.  But I'm just guessing as I don't use BD Armory (yet, getting around to it someday; so many mods, so little time)
this seems like an issue thats gonna need a modlist to solve

it seemingly (pure speculative guessing here, based upon other similar issues) is the missing gui (hidden off screen) issue. I don't know how BDA works, but if there is a config it will have to be manually edited to change the x,y of the gui window; else the mod stores the x,y of the window in the .sfs save file. just guessing.

Hi! Me again!

I ended up answering your question on TweakScale's thread!

In a way or another, you can ping me using @Lisias (@ L i s i a s) anywhere on forum when you think I can help on something, you don't need to post things on TweakScale for unrelated things!

I usually do my best to help - but not rarely you will get it before I'm able to read the post around here, as you had already realised!

Cheers!
